muscle.title: 7 Beginner Nutrition Mistakes to Avoid
muscle.description: When it comes to nutrition, knowing what not to do is just as important as knowing what you should do. Skip these food habits so you can reach your goals.

muscle.title: 4 Benefits Of Intra-Workout Supplements On Performance
muscle.description: Intra-workout supplements can be beneficial to help maximize your performance. In this article you'll learn about their benefits, and what ingredients you need to power your performance.

muscle.title: Grocery Shopping With IFBB Figure Pros w/ Samantha Jerring
muscle.description: Nutrex athlete, IFBB Pro, and self-proclaimed mustard connoisseur, Samantha Jerring, gives us a rundown of what her typical grocery haul looks like during her maintenance phase..

muscle.title: 8 Essential Muscle Building Supplements
muscle.description: Proper supplementation can be the secret weapon that makes your goals a reality. These supplements are backed by research and shown to help you reach your muscle building goals.

muscle.title: How to Time Your Pre and Post Workout Nutrition Intake
muscle.description: Pre and post workout nutrition is not only about consuming the right nutrients, but also about timing. Learn what the research shows regarding nutrient timing for optimal performance and recovery.

muscle.title: What You Should Know About Fasted Cardio
muscle.description: In this article you'll learn what the research shows regarding fasted cardio and fat loss loss. Hint: it could be a useful tool to help you reach your goals.

workouts.title: 10 Week Mass Building Program
workouts.description: This workout is designed to increase your muscle mass as much as possible in 10 weeks. Works each muscle group hard once per week using mostly heavy compound exercises.

workouts.title: Dumbbell Only Workout: 5 Day Dumbbell Workout Split
workouts.description: This 5 day dumbbell only workout program only requires dumbbells and is perfect for those looking to build lean muscle mass at home or on the go!

workouts.title: 6 Day Push/Pull/Legs (PPL) Powerbuilding Workout Split & Meal Plan
workouts.description: This 6 day push/pull/legs workout routine split is a high volume, rest-pause system designed for intermediate lifters looking to gain muscle and strength.

workouts.title: Dumbbell Only Workout: 3 Day Full Body Dumbbell Workout
workouts.description: This workout program only requires dumbbells, has just the right amount of volume to promote muscle growth, and is perfect to do at home or on the go.

workouts.title: 12 Week Fat Destroyer: Complete Fat Loss Workout & Diet Program
workouts.description: This is a complete 12 week program to help you get ripped. Feature includes detailed diet plan and cardio schedule, along with a 4 day upper/lower muscle building split.

workouts.title: 8 Week Mass Building Hypertrophy Workout
workouts.description: This 4-day program will help intermediate and advanced trainees gain size and strength. Rest-pause set, drop sets, and negatives will kick your muscle gains into high gear!

articles.title: Your Body Type - Ectomorph, Mesomorph or Endomorph?
articles.description: Your body type can influence how you respond to different types of workouts and diet plans. This guide helps you understand your body type (ectomorph, mesomorph or endomorph) and how you can structure your workout and diet for success.

articles.title: 7 Lat Pulldown Variations for Serious Back Development
articles.description: Build your lats in a variety of ways with these 7 lat pulldown variations! Read the article, find ones that'll fit well with your program, & build your back!

articles.title: 43 Best High Protein Recipes That Anyone Can Cook
articles.description: High protein cooking can be easy and delicious. Don't believe it? Check out these 43 recipes for high protein meals that anyone can cook!

articles.title: Arnold's Chest & Back Workout: The Best Pump Of All
articles.description: Everyone knows that Arnold lived for the pump, and this chest and back superset was his favorite workout to get both results and a hardcore pump.

articles.title: What Are The Ideal Body Measurements?
articles.description: Find out what the ideal measurements are for a natural bodybuilder or a classical muscular male physique.

articles.title: Overtraining - Why Less Is More
articles.description: This article will explore the reasons behind over training. Learn how many trainers know exactly why they shouldn't over train?
